function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased spread of misinformation and fake news related to the pandemic","Impact":"Risk of causing panic and misinformation leading to wrong health practices","Mitigation":"Fact-checking and providing reliable sources of information","Technologies":"AI algorithms for detecting fake news and misinformation","People":"General public","Owner":"Social media platforms, government health authorities"},{"Description":"Inefficient use of digital social networks for pandemic response","Impact":"Failure to effectively amplify pandemic control and mitigation measures","Mitigation":"Developing guidelines for accurate and responsible sharing of pandemic information","Technologies":"Digital community engagement platforms and educational content development","People":"Social media users, community groups","Owner":"Public health organizations, community leaders"},{"Description":"Psychological issues and mental health problems caused by social isolation","Impact":"Decreased well-being and mental health of individuals","Mitigation":"Provision of telepsychiatry services and social support systems","Technologies":"Mobile apps for virtual social connections and telepsychiatry services","People":"Isolated individuals and vulnerable groups","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, mental health professionals"}]}
